summary:
*Update: version 2 is released*
An abandoned ship may be a nice place to stay if you do not have that much gold.
Listen to the beautiful sound of the water crashing against the ship, enjoy cheese, wine and a book.
descriptionHtml:
*Update: version 2 is released*
An abandoned ship may be a nice place to stay if you do not have that much gold.
Listen to the beautiful sound of the water crashing against the ship, enjoy cheese, wine and a book.



If you like it or don\'t like it for some reason or got any advice, please share in the comment field! Thanks!

v2
*Changes done inside of the Abandoned Ship*
- Added more container for more storage (check images for details)
- Added more ship box misc
- Added more candle light
- Added some misc, Scroll of Guardian and few Ale.

v1
- Adds an Abandoned Ship that you can live in.



How to find my way:
1) Check the map in the photo section of this mod.
2) Find your Abandoned Ship near Lakeview Manor or a very short run from Riverwood and Falkreath or Helgen.
author: ValenwoodElf aka Sparrow
